text: That's a big deal for kids, when they come into the kitchen and the teacher is drinking coffee with mom. They react differently on the next day when you say: 'Sit down and shut-up!'
author: Ed O'Neill

text: I love my mother Ali so much. I'm a momma's boy. I just have a very cool mom. It's not as though I had any say in the matter. I'm just really fortunate. She's the most kind, loving, giving woman.
author: Hayden Christensen

text: My mom had gotten a Super 8 camera to make home movies with, and my brother and me got our hands on it and ran with it.
author: Lev Yilmaz

text: No one was more important than my mom and dad. I know they are watching from a place up in heaven here today to make sure all their kids are doing good.
author: Eddie Murray

text: I really like Calvin Klein for his classic simplicity. I also think Prabal Gurung designs some great pieces that work well for me. My mom has such great style she's my biggest influence.
author: Isabelle Fuhrman
